response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has the potential to significantly impact your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $1,000,000. After careful consideration, we propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,250,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a unique opportunity to secure a valuable asset at an advantageous rate. We understand that this investment could be substantial, but we are confident that the benefits will far outweigh the cost. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1250000}
